s.text: Bush tried to send two messages in response to the Texas shooting.
If Bush succeeds in projecting such sensitivity, the cure may prove worse than the disease.

Flanked by Texas' attorney general and the state's leading prosecutors, he unveiled a plan to hire extra prosecutors who would focus exclusively on gun crimes.

"It's inexplicable to me how somebody's heart could be so full of hate that he would walk into a place of worship where youngsters were seeking God's grace and love and kill people," Bush told the media.
Rushing home to "add some comfort to the pain and sorrow," Bush regretted that "there's not much to say" and that "all I could do ...
